summary: Holmes and Dr. Watson help a young lady who is receiving anonymous letters 10 years after her father passed away under shady circumstances. They find themselves in an enigma involving a treasure, murder and a love interest for Watson.
cast: Vasiliy Livanov|Vitali Solomin|Rina Zelyonaya|Borislav Brondukov|Ekaterina Zinchenko|Viktor Proskurin|Sergey Shakurov|Pavel Kadochnikov|Valentina Kosobutskaya|N. Yurasova|Vladimir Doroshev|Nikolay Kuzmin|P. Samojlenko|Anatoly Slivnikov|Georgiy Martirosyan|Larisa Solovyova
